page.title: 02HEALTH IN M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: HEALTH CENTRE Staffed by 3 doctors,some nurses and a visiting chiropodist. Open 5 weekday mornings and afternoons, morning only on Saturdays. Doctors operate a rota system for emergencies during which period they respond to calls from the district Ambulance Centre to attend large scale emergencies. Nurses dress minor wounds, give injections etc., and give pre and ante natal care. RED CROSS CENTRE When called upon provide first aid; also train in first aid skills. On request attend public functions. CHEMIST A dispensing chemist makes up prescriptions and advises on minor medical problems. Sells simple medicines for common ailments. DENTISTS open Mondays, Tuesdays and Thursday p.m. There are 2 dentists.
